rare.title: Puppy
rare.details: You happen upon a random puppy in the street. It seems interested in you guys, but looks frightened. If you're careful, you might be able to get it to follow you home!

uncommon.title: Trip-N-Fall
uncommon.details: One of your team members trips. Perform an Agility to check to see if you twist your ankle, reducing your movement speed by 5.

common.title: Zombies!
common.details: You run into between 2 and 5 zombies.

common.title: Run Forest
common.details: You see another person running away from a group of zombies.
